_sText:
October 1st, 2022 Update - I decided to untrash this map so people can find this page as a clear origin of this map, even if I'm not proud of it and it was a sh*tpost map, it did become one of the most played surf maps somehow.

Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3FyOwk7AmUA&feature=youtu.be Remake of the yesterday's uploaded surf_not_even_rookie. It had bad ramps so I made them easier, and I added another stages, now there are 21 stages. This is a tier 1 map made in about 5 hours. This map is created for surf timer servers, but you can play it without the timer.
